summary.p: This module requires the service of mod_proxy. It provides support for the UWSGI protocol.
Thus, in order to get the ability of handling the UWSGI protocol, mod_proxy and mod_proxy_uwsgi have to be present in the server.

note.title: Warning
note.p: Do not enable proxying until you have secured your server. Open proxy servers are dangerous both to your network and to the Internet at large.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Remember, in order to make the following examples work, you have to enable mod_proxy and mod_proxy_uwsgi.

The balanced gateway needs mod_proxy_balancer and at least one load balancer algorithm module, such as mod_lbmethod_byrequests, in addition to the proxy modules listed above. mod_lbmethod_byrequests is the default, and will be used for this example configuration.

example.title: Balanced gateway
example.highlight: ProxyPass "/uwsgi-bin/" "balancer://somecluster/" <Proxy balancer://somecluster> BalancerMember uwsgi://localhost:4000 BalancerMember uwsgi://localhost:4001 </Proxy>
